knimeNode.name: ImgPlus to PNG Images
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a KNIME Image Processing image (ImgPlusValue) to an image in KNIME PNG Image (PNGImageValue).

fullDescription.intro:
Converts a KNIME Image Processing Image (ImgPlusValue) from KNIME to KNIME PNG Image (PNGImageCell). At least two dimensions must be selected (the image plane). The alpha channel of the resulting PNG is ignored.
If there exist more than one images planes, e.g. in a video, then there will be as many PNG Images created as there exist planes (number of time steps in the case of the video).

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select the dimensions which serve as the image plane (often 'X', 'Y').
Select the dimension with the color information (often 'channel') or no dimension for grey value images.
